remove.description: Only usable together with `defaultPolicies.enabled=false`. This removes any existing policies if they were installed previously via `defaultPolicies.enabled=true`.

extraPolicies.description: Which extra network policies to install alongside Cilium.

enabled.description: Allow all DNS egress to CoreDNS.

namespaces.description: For which namespaces to install this policy.

enabled.description: Allow all egress to the HTTP/HTTPS proxy via L7 CiliumNetworkPolicy rule. For now this only supports an FQDN, not an IP address, inside the `httpProxy`/`httpsProxy` URLs.

namespaces.description: For which namespaces to install this policy.
